name: 2018/09/24 Lunch
description: This '2018/09/24 Lunch' recipe is a perfect blend of high-protein and low-sodium ingredients, making it an ideal choice for anyone looking to enjoy healthy, nutritious meals without compromising on taste. Featuring a combination of fresh fruits, lean ground pork, steamed bean curd roll, and crisp iceberg lettuce, this lunch is not only healthy but also delicious and satisfying.
recipeIngredient: 1 l Steamed Bean Curd Roll With Pork and Veg

recipeInstructions.text: Boil the egg to your preferred doneness, then peel and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the grapes and tangerines, then set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Season the lean ground pork with your choice of herbs and spices.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the seasoned ground pork in a pan over medium heat for about 10 minutes, until fully cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the steamed bean curd roll according to package instructions.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the lettuce iceberg and chop it for the salad base.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble the salad by placing the chopped lettuce on a plate, topping it with the cooked ground pork, and adding the steamed bean curd roll slices. Garnish with the salad topper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the prepared egg, grapes, and tangerines on the side to complete your nutritious lunch.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8
